api_list.name: XML Endpoint
api_list.description: Checks the give XML-Structure and values against the "Tracciato fattura elettronica B2B"

api_list.name: P7M Endpoint
api_list.description: Checks the give P7M-XML-Structure and values against the "Tracciato fattura elettronica B2B"

api_list.name: XML to PDF Endpoint
api_list.description: Converts a "Fattura elettronica"-XML into a PDF file
